------=_Part_6316036_1508899236.1420703528570
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hello,

When I am trying to crawl password protected pages, I got two response, first response gives 401, the second one has 200 OKIs there any way to reject the first response (401) in heritrix?
I have tried to view this warc-file in wayback machine but I always got 401 response.Is there any other viewer for warc-files that can solve this problem with 401-response for password protected pages?
Best regards
el
